description:
The aspect provides the information in which parent part(s)/product(s)the given item is to be assembled into or used. This could be a 1:1 relationship in terms of a e.g. a brake component or 1:n for e.g. coatings. The given item as well as the parent item must refer to an object from the as-planned lifecycle phase.
If multiple versions of parent parts exist that the child part can be assembled into or used, all versions of the parent part are included in the usage list.

QuantityValueCharacteristic.description: The quantity value associated with the unit expressed as float.

ItemQuantityCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for measurements of an item (mass, count, linear, area, volume, misc).

value.description: The quantity value associated with the unit.

unit.description: The unit of an item. Common units may be related to mass, count, linear, area, volume or misc.

Timestamp.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

BpnlTrait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNL is composed of prefix 'BPNL', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

ValidityPeriodCharacteristic.description: Characteristic  for a validity period defined by an (optional)start and an (optional)end timestamp.

validFrom.description: Start date and time of validity period.

ParentData.description: globalAssetId and meta data of the parent part.

quantity.description: Quantity of which the child part will be assembled into or used in the parent part.

createdOn.description: Timestamp when the relation between the parent part and the child part was created

businessPartner.description: The supplier of the given child item.

globalAssetId.description: The fully anonymous ID in the dataspace of the part.

lastModifiedOn.description: Timestamp when the assembly or usage relationship between parent part and child part was last modified.

validityPeriod.description:
The period of time during which the parent-child relation is valid. This relates to whether a child part can be built into or used in the production of the parent part at a given time.
If no validity period is given the relation is considered valid at any point in time.

SetOfParentItemsCharacteristic.description: Set of parent items the given child object will be assembled into or used (one structural level up).

ListOfCustomers.description: A list of customers and their related parent items.

items.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNL is composed of prefix 'BPNL', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

parentItems.description: Set of parent parts, in which the given child object will be assembled into or used (one structural level up).

customers.description:
A list of all customers of this item. If the parent items in which this item is assembled into are known, they should be listed as well.

For serialized items the list should contain only one customer with one parent item.
As different subsets of a batch might be sold to different customers this is a list.

globalAssetId.description: The fully anonymous ID in the dataspace of the part.
